entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or light snow overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow or freezing drizzle. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
